_installsitearch=$(${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl -e \ 'use Config; print $Config{"installsitearch"} . "\n";')
cat ${_installsitearch}/auto/Text/vFile/asData/.packlist |\ while read _file; do rm ${_file}
_dir=$(dirname ${_file}) test -d ${_dir} && rmdir ${_dir} 2>/dev/null done
rm ${_installsitearch}/auto/Text/vFile/asData/.packlist rmdir ${_installsitearch}/auto/Text/vFile/asData 2>/dev/null rmdir ${_installsitearch}/auto/Text/vFile 2>/dev/null rmdir ${_installsitearch}/auto/Text 2>/dev/null
